Plot: Two first-year students at Oxford University join the infamous Riot Club, where reputations can be made or destroyed over the course of a single evening.
Title: The Riot Club
Actors: Thomas Arnold, Harry Lloyd, Amber Anderson, Max Irons
tomatoConsensus: The Riot Club may not be subtle, but it makes its points with power, using dark humor and a talented cast to offer a scathing indictment of unearned privilege.
